register.description: Controls the power state of PER power domain

bitfield.description: OCMC RAM Group 2 (Last 192KB) memory on state
OCMC RAM Group 1 (First 64KB) memory on state
Other memories in PER Domain ON state
PRU-ICSS memory ON state
RAM2_MEM[OCMC RAM Group 2 (Last 192KB)] bank state when domain is retention.

bitenum.description: Memory is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.
Memory is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: RAM1_MEM[OCMC RAM Group 1 (First 64KB)] bank state when domain is retention.

bitenum.description: Memory is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.
Memory is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: PER_MEM bank state when domain is retention.

bitenum.description: Memory is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.
Memory is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: PRU-ICSS bank state when domain is retention.

bitenum.description: Memory is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.
Memory is off when the domain is in the RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Power state change request when domain has already performed a sleep transition. [[br]]Allows going into deeper low power state without waking up the power domain.

bitenum.description: Request a low power state change. This bit is automatically cleared when the power state is effectively changed or when power state is ON.
Do not request a low power state change.

bitfield.description: Logic state when power domain is RETENTION

bitenum.description: Whole logic is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.
Only retention registers are retained and remaing logic is off when the domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: PER domain power state control

register.description: This register provides a status on the current PER power domain state. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Last low power state entered. [[br]]Set to 0x3 upon write of the same only. [[br]]This register is intended for debug purpose only.

bitenum.description: Power domain was previously in RETENTION

bitfield.description: Domain transition status

bitenum.description: Power domain transition is in progress.
No on-going transition on power domain

bitfield.description: OCMC RAM Group 1 (Last 192KB) memory state status
OCMC RAM Group 1 (First 64KB) memory state status
PER domain memory state status
PRU-ICSS memory state status
Logic state status
Current Power State Status

register.description: This register controls the release of the PER Domain resets.

bitfield.description: PER domain PRU-ICSS local reset control

bitenum.description: Reset is asserted for the PRU-ICSS
Reset is cleared for the PRU-ICSS

register.description: This register logs the different reset sources of the PER domain. Each bit is set upon release of the domain reset signal. Must be cleared by software. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: PRU-ICSS Processor software reset status.

bitenum.description: PRU-ICSS Processor has been reset upon SW reset

register.description: This register contains dedicated L3 module context statuses. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. [[br]](set upon assertion of PER_DOM_RST signal)

bitfield.description: Specify if DFF-based context has been lost due to a previous power transition or other reset source. [[br]](set upon assertion of PER_DOM_RST signal)
